message.body: Didn't think it was gonna be that easy..
Its early
We got room for u in atl at my friends house
May have take you up on that
I am dead serious...someone cancelled...he is r very close family friend and makes a shitload..house has wine cellar..he bought house from hooters excutive
I arrive thurs at 7pm and leave tues afternoon..dave in friday out tues am
I just looked at tickets but they are $700. I will keep checking.
Dave would sell u some united miles i think ..i would have to talk to him tomorrow or tonight
Dave's on it , how about bmor or dulles or iad? FWD: Ok..he could fly out of any of the nyc airports..lga, newark or jfk
Newark and bwi are possibilities. Bwi had some decent flights.
Just then work days come into play.
Def open to it. And checking things out. 12 hour drive isn't out of the question either
Wow..but i get it
Do you guys have tickets or just going to scalp?
Scalp
I am in a box with free booze at half court..paid 20 bucks..haha
Man that is awesome. I'm in Du Bois
Haha
I here they have a good sandwich at sheetz...made to order even
Ha.
Unfortunately not going to be able to swing it. Thanks a lot for the offer.
